WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

CommonStockOtherSharesOutstanding.label: Common Stock, Other Shares, Outstanding
CommonStockOtherSharesOutstanding.description: Total number of shares of other common stock instruments held by shareholders, such as exchangeable shares. May be all or portion of the number of common shares authorized.

DebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.label: Debt and Lease Obligation
DebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.description: Amount of short-term and long-term debt and lease obligation.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Allowance for Doubtful Accounts
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from the allowance for doubtful accounts.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to tax credits. Including, but not limited to, research credit, foreign tax credit, investment tax credit, and other tax credits.

EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPCompensati.label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Compensation Expense
EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPCompensati.description: The amount of plan compensation cost recognized during the period.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsFinitelived.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets, Finite-lived
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsFinitelived.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of a finite-lived intangible asset to fair value.

ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets Held-for-use
ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long lived assets held for use (including those held for disposal by means other than sale).

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Domestic
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to domestic operations.

IncreaseDecreaseInFinanceReceivables.label: Increase (Decrease) in Finance Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInFinanceReceivables.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in outstanding loans including accrued interest.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

OtherIndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssets.label: Other Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets
OtherIndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssets.description: Amount after impairment of indefinite-lived intangible assets classified as other. Excludes financial assets and goodwill.

OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.label: Other Payments to Acquire Businesses
OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.description: The cash outflow associated with other payments to acquire businesses including deposit on pending acquisitions and preacquisition costs.

PaymentsForOtherTaxes.label: Payments for Other Taxes
PaymentsForOtherTaxes.description: Amount of cash outflow for taxes classified as other.

ProductLiabilityAccrualComponentAmount.label: Product Liability Accrual, Component Amount
ProductLiabilityAccrualComponentAmount.description: Recorded amount of the accrual for a material component of a product liability contingency.

SaleLeasebackTransactionGrossProceedsInv.label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Gross Proceeds, Investing Activities
SaleLeasebackTransactionGrossProceedsInv.description: Amount of cash inflow before closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in investing activities.

StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.label: Shares Granted, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.label: Shares Granted, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Forfeited
StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.description: Value of forfeited shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

AccountsPayableInterestBearingInterestRa.label: Accounts Payable, Interest-bearing, Interest Rate
AccountsPayableInterestBearingInterestRa.description: Reflects the effective interest rate as of the balance sheet date on interest-bearing trade payables.

AccruedProfessionalFeesCurrent.label: Accrued Professional Fees, Current
AccruedProfessionalFeesCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for professional fees, such as for legal and accounting services received. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccumulatedAmortizationDeferredFinanceCo.label: Accumulated Amortization, Debt Issuance Costs
AccumulatedAmortizationDeferredFinanceCo.description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs.

CommonStockOtherValueOutstanding.label: Common Stock, Other Value, Outstanding
CommonStockOtherValueOutstanding.description: Value of shares of other common stock instruments held by shareholders, such as exchangeable shares. May be all or portion of the number of common shares authorized.

DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountPremium.label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Discount (Premium) and Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountPremium.description: Amount of unamortized debt discount (premium) and debt issuance costs.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangi.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Goodwill
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangi.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from goodwill.

DividendsCash.label: Dividends, Cash
DividendsCash.description: Amount of paid and unpaid cash dividends declared for classes of stock, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred.

DividendsSharebasedCompensationStock.label: Dividend, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Shares
DividendsSharebasedCompensationStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid stock dividends declared for award under share-based payment arrangement.

DueFromOfficersOrStockholders.label: Due from Officers or Stockholders
DueFromOfficersOrStockholders.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company.

EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashCashEquivalent.label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashCashEquivalent.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currencies. Excludes amounts for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

ExcessStockSharesIssued.label: Excess Stock, Shares Issued
ExcessStockSharesIssued.description: Number of excess stock shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders.

ExcessStockSharesOutstanding.label: Excess Stock, Shares Outstanding
ExcessStockSharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares of excess stock held by shareholders.

FutureMinimumSubleaseRentalsSaleLeasebac.label: Future Minimum Sublease Rentals, Sale Leaseback Transactions, Thereafter
FutureMinimumSubleaseRentalsSaleLeasebac.description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

ImpairmentChargeOnReclassifiedAssets.label: Impairment Charge on Reclassified Assets
ImpairmentChargeOnReclassifiedAssets.description: For the asset that is reclassified back to held and used from held-for-sale, the amount of impairment charge that is recognized on the reclassification date.

LineOfCreditFacilityAverageOutstandingAm.label: Line of Credit Facility, Average Outstanding Amount
LineOfCreditFacilityAverageOutstandingAm.description: Average amount borrowed under the credit facility during the period.

LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumAmountOutstan.label: Line of Credit Facility, Maximum Amount Outstanding During Period
LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumAmountOutstan.description: Maximum amount borrowed under the credit facility at any time during the period.

LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumMonthendOutst.label: Line of Credit Facility, Maximum Month-end Outstanding Amount
LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumMonthendOutst.description: Maximum month-end amount borrowed under the credit facility during the period.

NoncashMergerRelatedCosts.label: Noncash Merger Related Costs
NoncashMergerRelatedCosts.description: Amount of expense (income) related to the increase (decrease) in reserve for business combination costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, and other costs incurred to consummate the merger.

PaymentsForOriginationOfMortgageLoansHel.label: Payments for Origination of Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
PaymentsForOriginationOfMortgageLoansHel.description: The amount of cash paid for the origination of mortgages that are held for sale.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfConvertiblePreferr.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Convertible Preferred Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfConvertiblePreferr.description: The cash inflow from issuance of preferred stocks identified as being convertible into another form of financial instrument, typically the entity's common stock.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherNet.description: Amount after depreciation of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

RegulatedEntityOtherAssetsNoncurrent.label: Regulated Entity, Other Assets, Noncurrent
RegulatedEntityOtherAssetsNoncurrent.description: Total of noncurrent other assets held by public utility entities.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

SubordinatedBorrowingInterestRate.label: Subordinated Borrowing, Interest Rate
SubordinatedBorrowingInterestRate.description: Stated interest rate of the subordinated debt.

TreasuryStockCommonShares.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Shares
TreasuryStockCommonShares.description: Number of previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupC.label: Assets Held-for-sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, Current
AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupC.description: Amount of assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group, expected to be sold within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AssetsHeldInTrustNoncurrent.label: Assets Held-in-trust, Noncurrent
AssetsHeldInTrustNoncurrent.description: The amount of cash, securities, or other assets held by a third-party trustee pursuant to the terms of an agreement which assets are available to be used by beneficiaries to that agreement only within the specific terms thereof and which agreement is expected to terminate more than one year from the balance sheet date (or operating cycle, if longer) at which time the assets held-in-trust will be released or forfeited.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operations
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashIncludingDiscontinuedOperations.label: Cash, Including Discontinued Operations
CashIncludingDiscontinuedOperations.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Includes cash within disposal group or discontinued operation.

CashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesD.label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Discontinued Operations
CashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesD.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of operating activities of discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

DebtInstrumentAnnualPrincipalPayment.label: Debt Instrument, Annual Principal Payment
DebtInstrumentAnnualPrincipalPayment.description: Amount of the total principal payments made during the annual reporting period.

DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.label: Debt Instrument, Basis Spread on Variable Rate
DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.description: Percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the debt instrument.

DebtInstrumentFeeAmount.label: Debt Instrument, Fee Amount
DebtInstrumentFeeAmount.description: Amount of the fee that accompanies borrowing money under the debt instrument.

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesActivityForYe.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Activity for Year, Average Balance of Agreements Outstanding
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesActivityForYe.description: The calculated average balance outstanding for the year for all Federal Home Loan Bank advances as of the Balance Sheet date.

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesWeightedAvera.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Weighted Average Interest Rate
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesWeightedAvera.description: Weighted average interest rate on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the parent.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per diluted share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Current
LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

LineOfCreditFacilityCollateralFeesAmount.label: Line of Credit Facility, Collateral Fees, Amount
LineOfCreditFacilityCollateralFeesAmount.description: Amount of the fees associated with providing collateral for the credit facility.

OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquireMachineryAndEquipment.label: Payments to Acquire Machinery and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquireMachineryAndEquipment.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of machinery and equipment.

PaymentsToAcquireOtherPropertyPlantAndEq.label: Payments to Acquire Other Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquireOtherPropertyPlantAndEq.description: Amount of cash outflow from the acquisition of or improvements to long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

PrepaidAdvertising.label: Prepaid Advertising
PrepaidAdvertising.description: Amount of consideration paid in advance for advertising that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets.

RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.label: Related Party Transaction, Amounts of Transaction
RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.description: Amount of transactions with related party during the financial reporting period.

ReorganizationValueNetRealizableValueOfA.label: Reorganization Value, Net Realizable Value of Asset Dispositions
ReorganizationValueNetRealizableValueOfA.description: Amount of reorganization value related to estimated net realizable value of asset dispositions. Reorganization value is the amount attributed to the reconstituted entity, as well as the expected net realizable value of those assets that will be disposed before reconstitution occurs.

RestructuringReserve.label: Restructuring Reserve
RestructuringReserve.description: Carrying amount (including both current and noncurrent portions of the accrual) as of the balance sheet date pertaining to a specified type of cost associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructuring pursuant to a duly authorized plan.

SellingAndMarketingExpense.label: Selling and Marketing Expense
SellingAndMarketingExpense.description: The aggregate total amount of expenses directly related to the marketing or selling of products or services.

SellingExpense.label: Selling Expense
SellingExpense.description: Expenses recognized in the period that are directly related to the selling and distribution of products or services.

ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTra.label: Share-based Goods and Nonemployee Services Transaction, Valuation Method, Expected Dividend Rate
ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTra.description: The estimated dividend rate (a percentage of the share price) to be paid (expected dividends) to holders of the underlying shares over the expected term of a nonvested share or option award issued to other than an employee.

SharesIssued.label: Shares, Issued
SharesIssued.description: Number of shares of stock issued as of the balance sheet date, including shares that had been issued and were previously outstanding but which are now held in the treasury.

AccruedLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.label: Accrued Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
AccruedLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of accrued expenses.

AdvanceRent.label: Advance Rent
AdvanceRent.description: Amount at the balance sheet date that has been received by the entity that represents rents paid in advance.

CommonStockDividendsShares.label: Common Stock Dividends, Shares
CommonStockDividendsShares.description: Number of shares of common stock issued as dividends during the period. Excludes stock splits.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the parent. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Basic Share
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per basic share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

IncomeTaxesPaid.label: Income Taxes Paid
IncomeTaxesPaid.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income.

IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidExpensesOther.label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Expenses, Other
IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidExpensesOther.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for other costs that provide economic benefits in future periods.

InterestPaidDiscontinuedOperations.label: Interest Paid, Discontinued Operations
InterestPaidDiscontinuedOperations.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period for interest owed on debt associated with discontinued operations.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.label: Payments for Capital Improvements
PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of or capital improvements to properties held for investment (operating, managed, leased) or for use.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfBankOverdrafts.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Bank Overdrafts
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfBankOverdrafts.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the excess drawing from an existing cash balance, which will be honored by the bank but reflected as a loan to the drawer.

ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Equity Method Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

StockAndWarrantsIssuedDuringPeriodValueP.label: Stock and Warrants Issued During Period, Value, Preferred Stock and Warrants
StockAndWarrantsIssuedDuringPeriodValueP.description: Value of preferred stock and warrants for common stock issued.
